{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard procedure of using Portable Power Tools","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Personal injury","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix.
2. Renew PPE when required.
3. Select well maintained tool for the task.
4. Ensure air hose and couplings are in good condition.
5. Utilise suitable anti-whiplash kit.","additionalMeasures":"1. Always ensure that the user is well versed with handling the equipment and well trained.","likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":4},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Hose bursting","existingMeasures":"1. Carry out inspection of air hoses prior use.
2. Utilize suitable pneumatic hoses and replace when showing signs of deteriorating.
3. Drain out moist or water accumulated inside hoses prior use.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Hose connection snapping off","existingMeasures":"1. To inspect the hose couplings for any damage before use .
2. Utilise suitable anti-whiplash kit.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Physical injury due to flying particles","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix.
2. Proper control of air supply of the tool.
3. Tools and equipment inspected prior usage.
4. Toolbox meeting to be carried out.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Inhaling of dust particles","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix.
2. Renew dust mask frequently.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Personal injury to others nearby","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix.
2. Beware of the surroundings and identify location of other team members nearby.
3. Work area to be cordoned off and all personnel informed.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}]}
